timeline.bodyText:
I very much like the transition of the Hazmat suit to the SlimefunArmorPiece system!
But I am not the greatest fan of id-comparison.
Best would be to create a new ItemAttribute, like "HazmatProtection" and then create a HazmatSuit class which extends SlimefunArmorpiece and implements that attribute.
This way we don't have to rely on hardcoded ids and are flexible in terms of adding more hazmat suits in the future.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText:
Also since you are only checking for ANY hazmat piece, you can break the loop here.
Or even better, make a seperate method with a boolean return type for this.
